Hero.subtitle: You have an idea. Describe it. Watch it come to life.

TheMagic.title: How It Works (No Tech Jargon)
TheMagic.personaLine: You know what you want to build, but not how to begin. This is made for you.
TheMagic.promiseLine: We provide a seamless onboarding path, so you can start quickly with the right setup from day one.
TheMagic.userMsg1: I want a simple website for my pottery classes.
TheMagic.aiMsg1: Perfect. I will guide you. What should visitors do first?
TheMagic.userMsg2: Book a class and join my mailing list.
TheMagic.aiMsg2: Great. I am setting up your pages, forms, and structure now.
TheMagic.punchline: You bring the idea. We guide the build.
TheMagic.supportingCopy: Behind the scenes, we apply proven best practices with opinionated tools and reusable skills, so you can focus on your business.

GettingStarted.title: Your Seamless Onboarding
GettingStarted.subtitle: Built for people who are not technical, but clear on what they want to create.
GettingStarted.benefit1desc: Clear prompts and next actions, so you always know what to do.
GettingStarted.benefit2desc: We pick a reliable toolset that works well together, so you skip the guesswork.
GettingStarted.benefit3desc: Your project starts clean, organized, and ready to grow.
GettingStarted.step1desc: Tell us what you want to build in plain language.
GettingStarted.step2desc: We use your answers to set everything up for you.
GettingStarted.step3desc: Use guided skills and templates instead of figuring it all out alone.
